content: @rylev how's your day looking like today? I think I should have time in around 50 minutes, but would also happily do some other work pending for me :)
Iâ€™m running very much behind today. Would be great if you could take it today!
/me wonders if we should active look for more people to help with this.
I'm not optimistic about being able to grow easily - it feels like a very high context task to me.
True, but one extra person would help a lot. Of course, my proposal in other topic would change the triage process significantly. We might want to wait for that to settle before looking for help.
yeah, I think waiting on it to settle is the right call.
I'd be happy to help here. I'm currently "unencumbered" by employment, so I have plenty of time, depending on how you look at things. :)
@Tyson Nottingham thanks! I think the best help right now is giving feedback on the discussion of the triage process. We want that to settle before we onboard new people to the triage process.
Sure :thumbs_up:
